name: No Limits Cream Bronzer and Contour Stick
about: What it is:u00a0A clean, talc-free, buildable cream bronzer that visibly sculpts, defines, and livens up the complexion with a silky-smooth, blendable formula...Highlighted Ingredients:.- Rosehip Oil: Antioxidant-rich with Vitamins A, C, and E to help reduce the look ofu00a0dark spots and improve moisture levels.- Green Tea Extract: Contains antioxidant benefits that soothe and replenish skin..- Sodium Hyaluronate: Helps skin retain moisture and visibly plumps to improve the look of fine lines...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Visibly sculpt, define, and warm up your complexion with this cream bronzer stick. The creamy, buildable formula effortlessly blends while delivering a sunkissed glow. Formulated with Rosehip Oil, this bronzer gives skin the warmth you want while blurring the look of imperfections and texture...
ingredients: - Rosehip Oil: Antioxidant-rich with Vitamins A, C, and E to reduce the look of dark spots and improve moisture levels..- Green Tea Extract: Contains antioxidant benefits that soothe and replenish skin..- Sodium Hyaluronate: Helps skin retain moisture and visibly plumps to improve the look of fine lines....Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Wax, Ceresin, Polyisobutene, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Trihydroxystearin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glucomannan, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Seed Oil. May Contain (+/-): Red Iron Oxide (Ci 77491), Yellow Iron Oxide (Ci 77492), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Black Iron Oxide (Ci 77499)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For immediate warmth, gently blend product into the hallows of the cheek, temples of the forehead, and jawline using a brush or sponge..-Build as needed.

It blends smoothly and stays all day. You'll have some time to play with the product because of its creamy texture. It applies evenly and you can also build it up. Lys Beauty is a very underrated makeup line that deserves more hype!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a light neutral olive, not too pale and not tan enough to be in that category.  I was really glad to see that this bronzer doesnu2019t have any sparkle in it.  Therefore, I use it like a natural sunny contour.  This is a really unique means of application.  Itu2019s a cream, but the kind that doesnu2019t feel all melty.  It turns to a powder finish, but not in the way that it simply sits on top of the skin if you know what I mean.  You can apply it directly from the stick and utilize the tip of the triangle to make sharper lines.  You can also just rub your fingers on it, pat a sponge, or wipe your brush over it.  Surprisingly, I enjoy using a brush!  I typically use my fingers, but using a brush to blend it all out really diffuses the look.  Iu2019m not too used to wearing bronzer and definitely not really used to contouring in the traditional sense, so I thought it was like too orange at first.  Honestly, thatu2019s just me being overly sensitive about seeing the bronze color.  A little goes a long way, so you can really tailor it to your liking.  I absolutely love how it looks on the forehead in particular, looks like a beautiful sunkissed tan look.  I prefer how this looks with a full face if Iu2019m going all over, but I like to use a tiny bit to give some life to my face especially on mornings where I just cannot lol.  I highly recommend this product and the price point is reasonable, as I feel this will last a long time.  Itu2019s very convenient to take around with you since itu2019s not a large pan, pot, what have you.  Itu2019s lightweight but doesnu2019t feel or look cheap.  You can bring it with you for a quick touch up if needed and blend with your fingers.  Very forgiving formula :)
